title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Dems call everything infrastructure. Riots in Minneapolis after police shooting, BLM at it again. Rush on how Occupy Wall Street used bashing Wall Street to make money. Hypocrite BLM founder buys million-dollar mansions. Rush busts the Democrats on their Big Lie about voter ID, Obama admitted to Al Sharpton that voter ID laws didn't prevent black people from voting. Pelosi won't let covid hysteria end. Flu cases suddenly vanish, Rush had that figured out. Rush on why Democrats want to end the filibuster, let the mob rule. Caller on how Democrats exploit race, hurt minorities.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Biden appoints commission on court packing. Rush on how Trump's court appointments are the most significant aspects of his legacy. Rush on the importance of Trump's gutsy appointment of Amy Coney Barrett. Democrats call everything infrastructure. Granholm vs. Christie. Rush on how Trump's infrastructure proposal would've actually rebuilt infrastructure. Democrats want to use "infrastructure" spending to redistribute wealth, not increase productivity. Rush on the infamous "bridge to nowhere". Caller outraged that there's no pushback over Biden's power grabs, no court orders, no judges throwing up road blocks like they did to Trump.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Trump and the GOP congress abolished the "double Irish" tax provision, Biden wants to bring it back. Big business, MLB continue to take Democrat side on Georgia voting law. Rush's take on groupthink and the new totalitarians. It's time for the GOP to stop carrying water for the corporatists. Trump and Rush were threats to the Swamp because they pushed back. Rush on racism as a public health threat. Hideki Matsuyama wins the Masters. Rush and Jim Nantz talk golf and life. EIB High Note: Good Deeds Day. Caller on Minnesota situation. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
